attributes.action: call in the West Durrington Development for thorough examination at a Public Inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This development of up to 1350 dwellings and utility buildings will be built on a Greenfield site off Titnore Lane Worthing. The Ancient Titnore Woods, important hedgerows and many protected species will be seriously affected. It is also an area much loved by the local residents who have campaigned for 6 years to save it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call in the West Durrington Development for thorough examination at a Public Inquiry."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21203


Prime Minister's Office
